text.autoconfig.autologin.title: Auto login
text.autoconfig.autologin.option.serverA: The server addresses that enable auto login, use ',' to separate multiple addresses
text.autoconfig.autologin.option.promptR: The keywords of the system message sent by the server when the player needs to log in, such as 'login', use ',' to separate multiple keywords
The keywords of the system message sent by the server when the player needs to register, such as 'register', use ',' to separate multiple keywords
text.autoconfig.autologin.option.loginCo: Login command, use the placeholder '%p' to represent the password
text.autoconfig.autologin.option.registe: Register command, use the placeholder '%p' to represent the password
